verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:21
verses.text: And David came to Saul, and stood before him: and he loved him greatly; and he became his armourbearer.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:22
verses.text: And Saul sent to Jesse, saying, Let David, I pray thee, stand before me; for he hath found favour in my sight.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:23
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the evil spirit from God was upon Saul, that David took an harp, and played with his hand: so Saul was refreshed, and was well, and the evil spirit departed from him.
